attributes.action: Not waste Government time and Tax Payers money on a snap General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no need for a general election when Labour has over 2 years left in power. The PM should get on with the business of running the country. He has a mandate already because he is the elected leader of the elected Labour party, and does not need to engage in unnecessary politics.
